A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User authentication and session management system
Interactive question display interface for live contests
Leaderboard showing user rankings and scores
User profile page displaying personal stats and contest history
Admin panel for creating and managing trivia contests
Database schema supporting users, contests, questions, answers, and scores
Responsive UI design with beige as base color and saddle brown for components
Package.json configured with npm run install:all for frontend and backend installation
Package.json configured with npm run dev for concurrent frontend and backend development servers
